Item.Data: <RuleCollection Type="Appx" EnforcementMode="Enabled"> <FilePublisherRule Id="baa06056-baea-4c8b-b8d3-078e0d1c3ef9" Name="Microsoft.Office.Outlook, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Office.Outlook" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="f2e0408e-cde2-426e-95bb-98b19f2c3cc4" Name="Microsoft.Office.Excel, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Office.Excel" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="68d6d57f-4cef-4850-9537-36a031d19e34" Name="Microsoft.Office.OneNote, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Office.OneNote" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="8a2837e6-e32a-4e71-ac5c-7ab4b493db13" Name="Microsoft.Office.PowerPoint, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Office.PowerPoint" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="b897dcb2-a0f3-4ae9-901d-eb59fff71a5a" Name="Microsoft.Office.Word, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Office.Word" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="bbc37f7f-0a04-4e61-a3fd-71e52faf4709" Name="Microsoft.Windows.Photos, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Windows.Photos" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="ea2d5d83-cbb7-44d9-81b6-dd4c4f5a3ffa" Name="Microsoft.People, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.People" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="78b75aa6-b143-4d5e-94d1-c6f54af5132b" Name="microsoft.windowscommunicationsapps, from CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="microsoft.windowscommunicationsapps" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="cec00f06-7354-44db-936d-7ebe0fd33dfa" Name="Microsoft.MicrosoftEdge, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.MicrosoftEdge" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> <FilePublisherRule Id="a732807e-ff3b-4139-ab46-bf0923f9ec9a" Name="Microsoft.Messaging, version 2.15.28004.0 and above, from Microsoft Corporation" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="CN=Microsoft Corporation, O=Microsoft Corporation, L=Redmond, S=Washington, C=US" ProductName="Microsoft.Messaging" BinaryName="*"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="2.15.28004.0" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> </RuleCollection>

<RuleCollection Type="Exe" EnforcementMode="Enabled"> <FilePublisherRule Id="c8360d06-f651-4883-abdd-9c3a95a415ff" Name="NOTEPAD.EXE, from O=MICROSOFT CORPORATION, L=REDMOND, S=WASHINGTON, C=US" Description="" UserOrGroupSid="S-1-1-0" Action="Allow"> <Conditions> <FilePublisherCondition PublisherName="O=MICROSOFT CORPORATION, L=REDMOND, S=WASHINGTON, C=US" ProductName="*" BinaryName="NOTEPAD.EXE"> <BinaryVersionRange LowSection="*" HighSection="*" /> </FilePublisherCondition> </Conditions> </FilePublisherRule> </RuleCollection>
